svcproc.title: CRANKCASE
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 11for all numbers in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove the key (30) or keys from the crankshaft and any burrs from the crankshaft where the key or keys were removed.

note.para: Through drive compressors may have a crankshaft key at both ends.

step1.para: Remove the four cap screws (33) and lockwashers or nuts and lockwashers that secure the rear end cover to the crankcase.
Remove the rear end cover (34), thrust bearing (35) and end cover 0-ring (32), taking care not to damage the bearing if present in the end cover.
lf the compressor has ball type main bearings (29), press the crankshaft and ball bearings from the crankcase, then press the ball bearings from the crankshaft.
Press the oil seal (40) out of the compressor crankcase if so equipped.
